title: Show loading indicator for time consuming operations (when user logs in; Dapp screen loading...)
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >)

### User Story

As a user, I want to see that app is busy so that I know I need to wait.

### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Feature 

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: Currently, when user initiates some time consuming operation there is no feedback from the app that it's working on it. It would be good to show some loading indicator to notify user that action isstarted/takes place/not finished yet.

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
- When user taps on Connect button -> show loading indicator untill we are ready to show the Chats screen. Than hide loading and show Chats.
- When Dapp screen is to be loaded and there is white screen shown -> show loading indicator on top of this screen
#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
User gets no feedback that app is working on initiated operation. E.g user taps on connect and can tap several times (becuase he/she does not see that app is already connecting). 
### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Tap on username
- Type password and tap on Connect
or
- Open Status
- Login
- Open any Dapp (e.g. Contacts -> Wallet)

### Solution
[comment]: # (Please summarise the solution and provide a task list on what needs to be fixed.)
*Summary*: 

- [ ] Design loading indicator
- [ ] Add loading indicator to Login screen
- [ ] Add loading indicator to Dapp screen

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: 0.9.3
* Operating System: Android and iOS
